courseDescription:
DaVinci Resolve 17 is a popular program for video editing and colour correction because of its many features. This free online video editing tutorial will help you get started with DaVinci 17, even if you have no prior experience. You will begin by creating a new project and importing footage and then learn to edit your page by scaling, adding text and effects. Next, the instructor will illustrate simple colour and audio correction before themes like the delivery page, how to archive your project, and set up a Proxy Workflow. 

The next section of this video editing certification will show you the steps needed to add multiple timelines and how to spot your clips. Managing and organizing your files is very important for version control, use in other projects, and efficiency and you will cover the concept of media management and the best way to organize your files. Some other learning areas include what exactly each of the tabs inside of the colour page are for and finishing off with the most technical part of this video editing training which is understanding colour correction and grading in much more detail.

With all the many features and tools in DaVinci Resolve 17, it is easy to be overwhelmed. It can be a technically challenging piece of software but this course will take you through the most important features in a systematic, understandable way so that you can apply your learning immediately. If you are in the creative or design space looking to understand more about video editing or if you are a keen videographer in your spare time and want to learn how to edit videos to create more professional masterpieces, then enrolling in this beginners course is exactly where you should start.
